EmailTemplate.subject: Season's Greetings from BendixKing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Channel Partner}},
On behalf of the entire BendixKing organization, Wingman Services and your BendixKing Authorized Repair Partners, we wish you and your families season’s greetings and happy new year!
